subsection.name: org.onehippo.forge.utilities.commons.NodeUtils
subsection.p: Static utility class for accessing JCR node properties without having to check RepositoryException. It also supports default values for Boolean, Date, Decimal, Double, Long, String and String[]. It has the following static methods:
subsection.source:
Boolean getBoolean(Node node, String propertyName) Boolean getBoolean(Node node, String propertyName, Boolean defaultValue)
Date getDate(Node node, String propertyName) Date getDate(Node node, String propertyName, Date defaultValue)
Decimal getDecimal(Node node, String propertyName) Decimal getDecimal(Node node, String propertyName, Decimal defaultValue)
Double getDouble(Node node, String propertyName) Double getDouble(Node node, String propertyName, Double defaultValue)
Long getLong(Node node, String propertyName) Long getLong(Node node, String propertyName, Long defaultValue)
String getString(Node node, String propertyName) String getString(Node node, String propertyName, String defaultValue)
String[] getStrings(Node node, String propertyName) String[] getStrings(Node node, String propertyName, String[] defaultValue)
